import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { CButton, CModal, CModalBody, CModalFooter, CModalHeader, CModalTitle } from '@coreui/react'; class ProductDetail extends Component { render() { const { large, setLarge, product, setImage } = this.props; return ( setLarge(!large)} size="lg"> {product.name}
setLarge(!large)}> Do Something {' '} setLarge(!large)}> Cancel ); } } export default ProductDetail;
